Interface IActionRegistry

Action registry interface

interface IActionRegistry {
    handleAction(action): void;
    registerPlugin(plugin): void;
    registerValidator(actionType, validator): void;
    unregisterPlugin(id): void;
    unregisterValidators(actionType): void;
    validateAction(action): IActionValidationResult;
}
